text: mēlum, nām (avarkaḷaip pārttu)"nīṅkaḷ uṅkaḷai veṭṭi māyttuk koḷḷuṅkaḷ, allatu uṅkaḷuṭaiya vīṭukaḷiliruntu veḷiyēṟiviṭuṅkaḷ" eṉṟu kaṭṭaḷaiyiṭṭiruppōmāṉāl, avarkaḷil cilarait tavira maṟṟavarkaḷ avvāṟu ceytirukka māṭṭārkaḷ - avarkaḷ taṅkaḷukku upatēcam ceyyappaṭṭapaṭi naṭantiruppārkaḷāṉāl, atu avarkaḷukku naṉmaiyākavum, (avarkaḷ nampikkaiyai) mikavum uṟutippaṭuttuvatākavum iruntirukkum
